dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:description: A variant of the MNIST dataset where the images are split into two parts, allowing for experiments in canonical correlation analysis (CCA).
dcterms:title: Split MNIST dataset

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset designed for testing stochastic independent component analysis (ICA) algorithms. It consists of generated data that mimics the characteristics of real-world signals.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset for stochastic ICA

dcterms:description: A dataset used for solving generalized eigenvalue problems (GEVP). It consists of pairs of matrices for which the eigenvalues and eigenvectors are computed.
dcterms:title: Generalized eigenvalue problem (GEVP) dataset

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for canonical correlation analysis (CCA) that provides pairs of datasets for evaluating CCA algorithms.
dcterms:title: CCA benchmark problem
